title: Work visas (H-1B, L-1, O-1, etc.) and I-94 records
personalDataVerified: Name, visa type, expiration date, employer, passport number
personalDataVisible: Photo (when verified, matching the photo on the visa). Expiration date alteration detection. Revocation date (if revoked). Link to DHS systems (US government officials only, requires login)
rationale: I-9 compliance; prevents altered expiration dates; DHS domain binding. Foreign workers can verify status without carrying physical visa documents, reducing risk while traveling domestically.
